code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{login}from'../auth/authSlice';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const resultAction=await dispatch(login({email,password}));if(login.fulfilled.match(resultAction)){navigate('/');}else{setError(resultAction.payload.message||'Invalid credentials');}}catch(err){setError('Login failed, please try again.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"back-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),children:"Back to Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-redirect",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Don't have an account?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/signup'),children:"Sign Up"})]})]});};export default Login;
